name: Luminous Tactics
description:
Summary: 

The darkness has invaded your kingdom, gather your shining heroes to defend the Neon Keep.

Features:

  • Tactical turn based combat
  • Your base. the keep, can be attacked and destroyed
  • You move the player characters, each with  their own set of abilities
  • Three element types and many attack patterns
  • Three different enemy designs with customized stats

Controls: 

  • Use WASD and mouse to move the camera around
  • Click on a player to move them and use abilities
  • Press escape to pause the game
